sentences.en: A gust of wind caught the parachute.
He got a fly - ass ninJa outfit and parachute.
sentences.cn: 他有忍者飞行的全套装备和降落伞.

sentences.en: He plunged 300ft to the ground when his parachute collapsed.
sentences.cn: 降落伞突然瘪了，他从300英尺的高空跌落到地面。

sentences.en: He was a courier for the Polish underground and parachuted into Warsaw.
sentences.cn: 他是波兰地下组织的信使，被空降到了华沙。

sentences.en: He was almost strangled by his parachute harness straps.
sentences.cn: 他差点被自己的降落伞吊带勒死。

sentences.en: He was killed because he ignored a warning to put stronger cords on his parachute.
sentences.cn: 他忽视了降落伞上要求使用更结实的绳索的警告信息，因而命丧黄泉。

sentences.en: Her skirt billowed out like a parachute.
sentences.cn: 她的裙子像降落伞般鼓起.
他的备用降落伞也坏了.
飞机用降落伞空投补给。

sentences.en: Sixty-one small parachute symbols were painted on the left side just forward of the wing.
sentences.cn: 61个小降落伞的标志被绘在左翼的正前面。

sentences.en: The airman boldly jumped from the airplane with his parachute.
sentences.cn: 飞行员带着降落伞勇敢地跳下飞机.

sentences.en: The Parachute Regiment could be forced to admit women.
sentences.cn: 伞兵团可能会被迫招收女性。

sentences.en: There is usefulness to the parachute.
When his parachute failed he thought he was a goner.
sentences.cn: 他的降落伞打不开了,他想他算完了.

trans.tran_cn: 降落伞，降落伞状物，[植]风散种子
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment fastened to the back of people who jump out of planes, which makes them fall slowly and safely to the ground
to jump from a plane using a parachute

trans.tran_cn: 用降落伞投送，用降落伞降落
